definition: suffix of a noun of locality
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁炉架摆放了一些绿叶以使边线看起来柔和一点。

sentences.english: Apply a 1px outside stroke with #8b8782 color.
Add a little extra touch to the stroke by drawing a 1px line with the Pencil Tool vertically up the entire edge.
sentences.chinese: 在整个边线上再用铅笔工具画1px的垂线。

sentences.english: Thisensures your eraser has a hard edge.
sentences.chinese: 这确保你的橡皮擦有个轮廓鲜明的边线。

sentences.english: The fourth goal came from a throw-in . It's unbelievable.
sentences.chinese: 第四个进球竟然来自边线发球，这是另人不能相信的。

sentences.english: The German coach has one of his substitutes warming up on the touch-line now.
sentences.chinese: 德国教练现在正让一个替换队员在边线旁做准备活动。

sentences.english: At the rain's edge, a sail.
These margins often show up as light solid or dashed lines on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 在屏幕上这些边线可能会显示为浅色的实线或虚线。

sentences.english: They each judge one side line and one base line.
sentences.chinese: 他们四人各自裁判一条边线或一条端线。

sentences.english: A quick pass to a back running toward the sideline.
sentences.chinese: 向朝边线跑的后卫传的一种快传球。

sentences.english: Go in 15MM from the front and mark the line on the bottom panel.
sentences.chinese: 正面进入15MM并在底板上划一条定位边线。

sentences.english: As soon as he's silly and steps on aline.
sentences.chinese: 一旦他傻傻的踩上边线。

sentences.english: However, you can drag along to move these carrying of side line point to change a side line to owe definition.
sentences.chinese: 然而，您可拖动这些边线的端点来改边线到欠定义。

sentences.english: However, you can drag along to move these carrying of side line point to change a side line to owe definition.
sentences.chinese: 然而，您可拖动这些边线的端点来改边线到欠定义。

sentences.english: Extrude the edges in and chamfer the edges by 3 to get a smooth transition (Fig. 14).
sentences.chinese: 向内挤压边线，然后切分出3断，以获得平滑的过渡。

sentences.english: The linesman running the East Stand side.
sentences.chinese: 在东面看台那边奔跑的边线裁判。

definition: to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
to cross a border/to go out of bounds (sport)
to scout for a tour operator/to reconnoiter a potential tour itinerary/(tennis) to commit a foot fault
